mapper.select: select t.id,title,date_format(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') start_date,date_format(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end_date,start_time,end_time,content, count,length,p.name credential from tb_train t ,tb_params p where t.credential=p.value and type='credential' and t.id=#{arg0}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_train(title,start_date,end_date,start_time,end_time,content,count,length,credential,url) values(#{title},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{content},#{count},#{length}, (select value from tb_params where name=#{credential} and type='credential'),#{url})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_train where date_format(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}
select count(*) from tb_train where date_format(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{date}
